Name: Cutter
Description: In the underworld of the Dusk, there are scoundrels who take what they want at the bloody edge of a blade or with a threatening presence that can stop a man cold. They are the enforcers, the debt collectors, the killers, the leg-breakers, and the thugs, commonly known as Cutters.
Where subtlety fails, swift brutality - and the threat of worse to come - can solve the problem. Or at least turn it into a different kind of problem.
XpTrigger: When you play a Cutter, you earn xp when you address a challenge with violence or coercion.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Battleborn
SpecialAbilities.Text: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Bodyguard
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Ghost Fighter
SpecialAbilities.Text: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain potency in combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Leader
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you COMMAND a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Mule
SpecialAbilities.Text: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Not To Be Trifled With
SpecialAbilities.Text: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman - engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Savage
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you unleash physical violence, it's especially frightening. When you COMMAND a frightened target, take +1d.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Vigorous
SpecialAbilities.Text: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Veteran
SpecialAbilities.Text: Choose a special ability from another source.

Items.Name: Fine hand weapon
Items.Description: A finely crafted one-handed melee weapon of your choice.

Items.Name: Fine heavy weapon
Items.Description: A finely crafted two-handed melee weapon of your choice.

Items.Name: Scary weapon or tool
Items.Description: A scary-looking hand weapon or tool.

Items.Name: Manacles & chain
Items.Description: A set of heavy manacles and chain, suitable for restraining a prisoner.

Items.Name: Rage essence vial
Items.Description: A single dose, which greatly enhances the user's strength, resistance to pain, and irrational aggression for the span of several minutes.

Name: Hound
Description: There's always a need for scoundrels who can find what others want to keep hidden. Whether that's a deadbeat gambler trying to skip out on their debts, a treacherous informant or witness who's going to squeal to the Bluecoats, or the trail to a treasure squirreled away in a secret vault - it's the Hounds that ferret them out.
Why have a fair fight, when you can stalk and ambush your prety on your terms? The underworld is your hunting ground.
XpTrigger: When you play a Hound, you earn xp when you address a challenge with tracking or violence.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Sharpshooter
SpecialAbilities.Text: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what's normal for the weapon - unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Focused
SpecialAbilities.Text: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Ghost Hunter
SpecialAbilities.Text: Your hunting pet is imbued with spirit energy. It gains potency when tracking or fighting the supernatural, and gains an arcane ability: ghost-form, mind-link, or arrow-swift. Take this ability again to choose an additional arcane ability for your pet.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Scout
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you gather information to discover the location of a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Survivor
SpecialAbilities.Text: From hard-won experience or occult ritual, you are immune to the poisonous miasma of the deathlands and are able to subsist on the strange flora and fauna there. You get +1 stress box.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Tough as Nails
SpecialAbilities.Text: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).

SpecialAbilities.Name: Vengeful
SpecialAbilities.Text: You gain an additional xp trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you get payback, also mark crew xp.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Veteran
SpecialAbilities.Text: Choose a special ability from another source.

Items.Name: Fine pair of pistols
Items.Description: A matched pair of handguns, made for greater accuracy, with double barrels that allow for two shots before reloading.

Items.Name: Fine long rifle
Items.Description: A finely crafted hunting rifle, deadly at long range, unwieldy in close quarters.

Items.Name: Electroplasmic ammunition
Items.Description: A bandolier of electroplasmic ammo, especially potent against spirits, but less effective against physical targets.

Items.Name: A trained hunting pet
Items.Description: Your animal companion obeys your commands and anticipates your actions.

Items.Name: Spyglass
Items.Description: A brass tube with lenses that allow long-distance vision. Collapsible. May attach to a rifle.

Name: Leech
Description: The world is built on industry, and the underworld is no different. Leeches are the scoundrels who distill the drugs, refine the arcane essences, build the bombs, bandage the wounds, and forge the tools of the criminal trades - and knowing how to make things also means knowing how to break them.
XpTrigger: When you play a Leech, you earn xp when you address a challenge with technical skill or mayhem.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Alchemist
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you invent or craft a creation with alchemical features, you get +1 result level to your roll (a 1-3 becomes a 4/5, etc.). You begin with one special formula already known.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Analyst
SpecialAbilities.Text: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Artificer
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you invent or craft a creation with spark-craft features, you get +1 result level to your roll (a 1-3 becomes a 4/5, etc.). You begin with one special formula already known.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Fortitude
SpecialAbilities.Text: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling alchemicals.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Ghost Ward
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you WRECK an area with arcane substances, ruining it for any other use, it becomes anathema or enticing to spirits (your choice).

SpecialAbilities.Name: Physicker
SpecialAbilities.Text: You can TINKER with bones, blood, and bodily humours to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may STUDY a malady or coprse. Everyone in your crew (including you) gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Saboteur
SpecialAbilities.Text: When you WRECK, your work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is very well-hidden from casual inspection.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Venomous
SpecialAbilities.Text: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can push yourself to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.

SpecialAbilities.Name: Veteran
SpecialAbilities.Text: Choose a special ability from another source.

Items.Name: Fine tinkering tools
Items.Description: A finely crafted set of tools for detailed mechanist work. A jeweler's loupe. Measuring devices.

Items.Name: Fine wrecking tools
Items.Description: A specialized set of tools for sabotage and destruction. A small, powerful drill. A mallet and steel spikes. A prybar. An electroplasmic battery, clamps, wire. Vials of acid. A spark-torch cutter and fuel tank.

Items.Name: Blowgun & darts, syringes
Items.Description: A small tube and darts that can be filled from alchemy flasks. Empty syringes.

Items.Name: Bandolier
Items.Description: A strap worn across the body, fitted with specially-padded pouches to hold three alchemical agents or spark-craft bombs. When you employ an alchemical or bomb from a bandolier, choose one from (or one of your custom-made formulas): Alcahest, Binding Oil, Drift Oil, Drown Powder, Eyeblind Poison, Fire Oil, Grenade, Quicksilver, Skullfire Poison, Smoke Bomb, Spark (Drug), Standstill Poison, Trance Powder. During downtime, you automatically refill your bandoliers, so long as you have reasonable access to a supplier or workshop.

Items.Name: Gadgets
Items.Description: You may create gadgets during downtime by TINKERING with tools and materials. Track the load for each gadget you deploy during an operation.
